top_stories.title: Google’s AI-stuffed Pixel 10 event
top_stories.description: The Pixel line has often been on the cutting edge of mobile photography. This year, that means baking AI straight into the camera app and making us grapple with all of the very messy things that means. I've been scouring the internet for sample images of the Pixel 10 Pro's AI-enhanced 100x zoom feature - […]
top_stories.author: Jacob Kastrenakes
top_stories.content: The Pixel line has often been on the cutting edge of mobile photography. top_stories.title: Now We’re Talking: NVIDIA Releases Open Dataset, Models for Multilingual Speech AI
top_stories.description: Of around 7,000 languages in the world, a tiny fraction are supported by AI language models. NVIDIA is tackling the problem with a new dataset and models that support the development of high-quality speech recognition and translation AI for 25 European languages — including languages with limited available data like Croatian, Estonian and Maltese. These Read Article
top_stories.author: Jonathan Cohen
top_stories.content: Of around 7,000 languages in the world, a tiny fraction are supported by AI language models. These Read Article

top_stories.title: Amazon builds first foundation model for multirobot coordination
top_stories.description: Trained on millions of hours of data from Amazon fulfillment centers and sortation centers, Amazon’s new DeepFleet models predict future traffic patterns for fleets of mobile robots.
top_stories.author: Joey Durham
top_stories.content: Trained on millions of hours of data from Amazon fulfillment centers and sortation centers, Amazon’s new DeepFleet models predict future traffic patterns for fleets of mobile robots.

top_stories.title: CrowdStrike, Uber, Zoom Among Industry Pioneers Building Smarter Agents With NVIDIA Nemotron and Cosmos Reasoning Models for Enterprise and Physical AI Applications
top_stories.description: AI agents are poised to deliver as much as $450 billion from revenue gains and cost savings by 2028, according to Capgemini. Developers building these agents are turning to higher-performing reasoning models to improve AI agent platforms and physical AI systems. At SIGGRAPH, NVIDIA today announced an expansion of two model families with reasoning capabilities Read Article

top_stories.title: Agent Factory: The new era of agentic AI—common use cases and design patterns
top_stories.description: Instead of simply delivering information, agents reason, act, and collaborate—bridging the gap between knowledge and outcomes. Read more about agentic AI in Azure AI Foundry. The post Agent Factory: The new era of agentic AI—common use cases and design patterns appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog.
